product_name: Case Cutlery Yellow Synthetic Folding Hunter Knife
long_description: The Folding Hunter knife from Case Cutlery combines timeless design with a durable chrome vanadium blade, offering a lifelong camping companion able to tackle outdoor tasks with precision.
